channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 17:10 Air alarm in Kyiv Investigate by further messages.
item.description: 游댮 17:10 Air alarm in Kyiv Investigate by further messages.#M_Kyev This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
